articles.title: Pressley joins strikers, protesters at Gaza hunger strike rally
articles.description:
Participants in the People’s Hunger Strike for Gaza called on Massachusetts senators to introduce anti-bomb legislation.

articles.title: 2 Mass. brothers aboard an aid flotilla to Gaza have been detained by Israeli forces: Here’s what we know.
articles.description:
The two Sheffield men were arrested by Israeli forces and taken to Ashdod after their boats were intercepted Wednesday and Thursday.

The post 2 Mass. brothers aboard an aid flotilla to Gaza have been detained by Israeli forces: Here’s what we know. appeared first on Boston.com.
